data.fullContent: Joel and his friend Mike were hired to clear a lot of cedar trees on a large parcel of land owned by an elderly lady in the town next door. The trees were old and gnarled and had grown so thick that they were making it difficult for her to drive her car to the store. She had tried to have someone cut the trees with a chainsaw, but it was taking too long. She asked Joel if he knew anybody who could do it more quickly. He found his friend Mike, who was in need of some money to start his business, so he offered to help Joel, and they got to work. They cleared out a path that would easily fit the lady's car during that first day, but they knew there were many more trees still to go. After they left, the lady was extremely grateful for their work and offered Joel a bonus that he could use as he wanted.

q1.translation: 乔尔和他的朋友迈克被雇来清理一大片雪松树，这片土地的所有者是隔壁镇上的一位老妇人。那些树又老又粗糙，长得很厚，使她很难开车去商店。她曾试图让人用电锯砍树，但耗时太长。
q1.front: Joel and his friend Mike were hired to clear a lot of cedar trees on a large parcel of land owned by an elderly lady in the town next door. The trees were old and gnarled and had grown so thick that they were making it difficult for her to drive her car to the store. She had tried to have someone cut the trees with a chainsaw, but it was taking too long.
q1.content: Joel and his friend Mike were hired to clear a ____ of cedar trees on a large parcel of land ____ by an elderly lady in the town next door. The ____ were old and gnarled and had grown ____ thick that they were ____ it difficult for her to drive ____ car to the store. She had ____ to have someone cut the trees with a chainsaw, but ____ was taking ____ long.

q2.translation: 乔尔和他的朋友迈克被雇来清理一大片雪松树，这片土地的所有者是隔壁镇上的一位老妇人。那些树又老又粗糙，长得很厚，使她很难开车去商店。她曾试图让人用电锯砍树，但耗时太长。她问乔尔是否知道谁能做得更快。他找到了他的朋友迈克，迈克需要一些钱来做生意，所以他提出帮助乔尔，他们开始工作。在第一天，他们清理出了一条很容易容纳女士的车的道路，但他们知道还有很多树要去。他们离开后，这位女士对他们的工作非常感激，并给了乔尔一笔奖金，他可以随意使用。
q2.front: Joel and his friend Mike were hired to clear a lot of cedar trees on a large parcel of land owned by an elderly lady in the town next door. The trees were old and gnarled and had grown so thick that they were making it difficult for her to drive her car to the store. She had tried to have someone cut the trees with a chainsaw, but it was taking too long.
q2.middle: She asked Joel if he knew anybody who could do it more quickly.
q2.ending: He found his friend Mike, who was in need of some money to start his business, so he offered to help Joel, and they got to work. They cleared out a path that would easily fit the lady's car during that first day, but they knew there were many more trees still to go. After they left, the lady was extremely grateful for their work and offered Joel a bonus that he could use as he wanted.

options.sentence: Joel and his friend Mike were clearing trees for an elderly lady who owned a lot of land.
Joel and Mike arranged the purchase of a large piece of land in the remote area.
Joel and Mike worked hard every day for two weeks so they could have a lush field ready for planting.
Joel, the developer of this subdivision, had to clear the land of trees and build roads under it.
